page.title: 11CRUCKMEOLE FARM GENERAL
page.content:
The farmer has a{Caravan Club Site}on which a maximum of{5 Caravans}are permitted at any one time.The only facilities provided are a water supply and a cess pit for toilet waste.The people that use the site come from all over the British Isles and many other countries including Australia.
{The soft fruits }grown on Cruckmeole Farm include Strawberries, Raspberries, Gooseberries and Blackberries. These fruits are picked by{"Pick your own"}customers between late June and early August.The fruit is grown near the house for security and easy access of customers in the season.
